title: Shrewsbury
summary: Shrewsbury (/ˈʃroʊzbri/ (listen) SHROHZ-bree, /ˈʃruːz-/ (listen) SHROOZ-)[4][5] is a large market town and the county town of Shropshire, England. The town is situated on the River Severn, 150 miles (240 km) north-west of London, and the 2011 census recorded a population of 71,715.[3][6]
